Create a GRangesList object given a BEDset id

Source: R/bedbaser.R
bb_to_grangeslist.Rd

Create a GRangesList object given a BEDset id

bb_to_grangeslist(api, bedset_id, quietly = TRUE)

Arguments

api

API object of BEDbase created from BEDbase()

bedset_id

integer() BEDset record identifier

quietly

logical() (default TRUE) display messages

Value

GRangesList() object

Examples

api <- BEDbase()
#> Warning: incomplete final line found on '/tmp/RtmpoOvgkM/filed3273a8286a'
id <- "lola_hg38_ucsc_features"
bb_to_grangeslist(api, id)
